text: Michael Cacoyannis (, Michalis Kakogiannis; 11 June 192225 July 2011) was a Cypriot-Greek director, producer, and screenwriter. He was best known for his 1964 movie Zorba the Greek. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Obituary of Michael Cacoyannis, The Daily Telegraph, 25 July, 2011] Category:1922 births Category:2011 deaths Category:Cypriot writers Category:Greek movie directors Category:Greek movie producers Category:Greek screenwriters Category:People from Athens
title: Michael Cacoyannis
